column2: Q3. Do you feel you can contact your parent(s) in a timely manner when you need to during the school day?
column3: Q5. On an average school day (from when you arrive at school to when you leave), how much time do you spend using your phone?
column4: Q12. How satisfied are you with your school’s phone policy?
column5: Q13. How fairly do teachers and staff enforce your school's phone policy? Give your best guess.
column6: Q14. What percentage of your classmates are using their phone when they shouldn’t be? Give your best guess.

column14:
We are interested in understanding how you feel about your school's phone policy. Please rate your agreement with the following statements about your behavior or feelings since the
policy was introduced. “Since the new phone policy was introduced...” - I have felt closer to my friends.
